languages.text: "Бывший Мастер шепотов, Кунрад Войгтвир. Теперь понятно, как ему удавалось каждый раз ускользать от наших шпионов — на его стороне технологии врагов Человечества. Мерзкий предатель! Мои агенты вычислили координаты базы, на которой Кунрад тайно встречался с ксеносами — это станция в системе Перекресток Сотни Снов. Она давно выведена из эксплуатации и заброшена. Нам это даже на руку — отличный шанс устроить засаду и внезапно нанести удар".

traits.locale_text: "Бывший Мастер Шепотов, Кунрад Войгтвир. Теперь понятно, как ему удавалось каждый раз ускользать от наших шпионов — на его стороне технологии врагов Человечества. Мерзкий предатель! Мои агенты вычислили координаты базы, на которой Кунрад тайно встречался с ксеносами — это станция в системе Перекресток Сотни Снов. Она давно выведена из эксплуатации и заброшена. Нам это даже на руку — отличный шанс устроить засаду и внезапно нанести удар".

languages.text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."
languages.original_text: "Бывший Мастер шепотов, Кунрад Войгтвир. Теперь понятно, как ему удавалось каждый раз ускользать от наших шпионов — на его стороне технологии врагов Человечества. Мерзкий предатель! Мои агенты вычислили координаты базы, на которой Кунрад тайно встречался с ксеносами — это станция в системе Перекресток Сотни Снов. Она давно выведена из эксплуатации и заброшена. Нам это даже на руку — отличный шанс устроить засаду и внезапно нанести удар".

traits.locale_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to avoid our spies time and time and gain — he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the coordinates of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret — a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of order, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands — it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

languages.text: « Votre précédent maître des murmures, Kunrad Voigtvir. Nous savons désormais comment il a réussi à éviter nos espions à tant de reprises, grâce à la technologie des ennemis de l'humanité. Le vil traître ! Mes agents ont localisé la base sur laquelle Voigtvir rencontre les xénos dans le plus grand secret, une station dans le système de la Croisée des Cent Rêves. Selon la rumeur, la station est hors d'usage, abandonnée depuis un certain temps. Et cela joue en notre faveur. C'est l'endroit idéal où tendre une embuscade et les frapper là quand ils s'y attendent le moins. »
languages.original_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

traits.locale_text: « Votre précédent maître des murmures, Kunrad Voigtvir. Nous savons désormais comment il a réussi à éviter nos espions à tant de reprises, grâce à la technologie des ennemis de l'humanité. Le vil traître ! Mes agents ont localisé la base sur laquelle Voigtvir rencontre les xénos dans le plus grand secret, une station dans le système de la Croisée des Cent Rêves. Selon la rumeur, la station est hors d'usage, abandonnée depuis un certain temps. Et cela joue en notre faveur. C'est l'endroit idéal où tendre une embuscade et les frapper là quand ils s'y attendent le moins. »

languages.text: “那个人就是曾经的低语之主，昆拉德·维特威尔。现在我们终于弄清楚他是怎么一次次避开我们的眼线了。那个卑劣的叛徒得到了人类之敌的技术！我的特工已经确定了维特威尔和那些异形秘密会面的位置。那座星站位于百梦岔口，据说前不久出了故障而遭到了遗弃。这对我们很有利，因为那里是个绝佳的伏击地点，我们可以从他们最意想不到的位置发起突袭。”
languages.original_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

traits.locale_text: “那个人就是曾经的低语之主，昆拉德·维特威尔。现在我们终于弄清楚他是怎么一次次避开我们的眼线了。那个卑劣的叛徒得到了人类之敌的技术！我的特工已经确定了维特威尔和那些异形秘密会面的位置。那座星站位于百梦岔口，据说前不久出了故障而遭到了遗弃。这对我们很有利，因为那里是个绝佳的伏击地点，我们可以从他们最意想不到的位置发起突袭。”

languages.text: 「あなたの前の囁きの主である、クンラッド・ボイトヴィル。なぜ彼が我々のスパイの目を何度もかいくぐることができたのか、ようやく分かりました。彼は人類の敵の技術を使っているのです。何と卑劣な裏切り者でしょう！私の諜報員たちが、ボイドヴィルが秘密裏に異種族と会っていた基地の場所を突き止めました。百夢の十字路星系にある宇宙ステーションです。そのステーションは、しばらく前に機能不全となり、放棄されたと言われています。それが今、私たちの手の内にある。待ち伏せを仕掛け、不意打ちの攻撃をするには絶好の場所と言えましょう」。
languages.original_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの前の囁きの主である、クンラッド・ボイトヴィル。なぜ彼が我々のスパイの目を何度もかいくぐることができたのか、ようやく分かりました。彼は人類の敵の技術を使っているのです。何と卑劣な裏切り者でしょう！私の諜報員たちが、ボイドヴィルが秘密裏にゼノと会っていた基地の場所を突き止めました。百夢の十字路星系にある宇宙ステーションです。そのステーションはしばらく前に機能不全となり、放棄されたと言われています。それが今、私たちの手の内にある。待ち伏せを仕掛け、不意打ちの攻撃をするには絶好の場所と言えましょう」。

languages.text: "Euer vormaliger Meister des Geflüsters, Kunrad Voigtvir. Wir wissen jetzt, wie er unseren Spionen immer wieder entkam – er nutzte die Technologien der Feinde der Menschheit. Niederträchtiger Verräter! Meine Agenten fanden den Standort der Basis heraus, wo sich Voigtvir heimlich mit Xenos traf – eine Station im Knotenpunkt der hundert Träume. Die Station war angeblich stillgelegt und wurde seit längerem nicht mehr benutzt. Das spielt uns in die Hände. Dort ist ein ausgezeichneter Ort, um einen Hinterhalt zu planen und zuzuschlagen, wo sie es am wenigsten erwarten."
languages.original_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

traits.locale_text: "Euer vormaliger Meister des Geflüsters, Kunrad Voigtvir. Wir wissen jetzt, wie er unseren Spionen immer wieder entkam – er nutzte die Technologien der Feinde der Menschheit. Niederträchtiger Verräter! Meine Agenten fanden den Standort der Basis heraus, wo sich Voigtvir heimlich mit Xenos traf – eine Station im Knotenpunkt der hundert Träume. Die Station war angeblich stillgelegt und wurde seit längerem nicht mehr benutzt. Das spielt uns in die Hände. Dort ist ein ausgezeichneter Ort, um einen Hinterhalt zu planen und zuzuschlagen, wo sie es am wenigsten erwarten."

languages.text: «Su anterior maestro de susurros, Kunrad Voigtvir. Ahora ya sabemos cómo ha conseguido eludir una y otra vez a nuestros espías: cuenta con la tecnología de los enemigos de la Humanidad. ¡Ese vil traidor! Mis agentes han determinado la ubicación de la base en la que Voigtvir se reúne en secreto con los xenos, una estación situada en el sistema de la Encrucijada de los Cien Sueños. Se supone que está inutilizada, lleva un tiempo abandonada. Eso nos viene al pelo: es un lugar excelente para tender una emboscada y golpearle donde menos se lo espera».
languages.original_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

traits.locale_text: «Su anterior maestro de susurros, Kunrad Voigtvir. Ahora ya sabemos cómo ha conseguido eludir una y otra vez a nuestros espías: cuenta con la tecnología de los enemigos de la Humanidad. ¡Ese vil traidor! Mis agentes han determinado la ubicación de la base en la que Voigtvir se reúnen en secreto con los xenos, una estación situada en el sistema de la Encrucijada de los Cien Sueños. Se supone que está fuera de servicio, lleva un tiempo abandonada. Eso nos viene al pelo: es un lugar excelente para tender una emboscada y golpearle donde menos se lo espera».

languages.text: "Eski Fısıltı Üstadı Kunrad Voigtvir. Casuslarımızı tekrar tekrar nasıl atlatabildiğini artık biliyoruz: İnsanlığın düşmanlarının teknolojilerini kullanıyormuş. Kahrolası hain! Ajanlarım, Voigtvir'in gizli gizli zenolarla buluştuğu üssün konumunu kesin olarak tespit etti: Yüz Rüya Kesişimi sistemindeki bir istasyon. İstasyon bir süre önce terk edilmiş, faaliyet dışı durumda olmalı. Bu da işimize geliyor: Pusu kurup en beklenmedik anda saldırmak için mükemmel bir yer."
languages.original_text: "Your former Master of Whispers, Kunrad Voigtvir. Now we know how he's been able to dodge our spies time and time and again: he has the technology of enemies of Humanity on his side. Vile traitor! My agents ascertained the location of the base where Voigtvir has been meeting with xenos in secret, a station in the system of the Hundred Dreams Crossroads. The station is allegedly out of commission, abandoned some time ago. That plays into our hands: it is an excellent place to set up an ambush and strike where they least expect it."

traits.locale_text: "Eski Fısıltı Üstadı'nız Kunrad Voigtvir. Casuslarımızı tekrar tekrar nasıl atlatabildiğini artık biliyoruz: İnsanlığın düşmanlarının teknolojilerini kullanıyormuş. Kahrolası hain! Ajanlarım Voigtvir'in gizli gizli zenolarla buluştuğu bir üssün konumunu kesin olarak tespit etti: Yüz Rüya Kesişimi sistemindeki bir istasyon. İstasyon bir süre önce terk edilmiş ve faaliyet dışı durumda olmalı. Bu da işimize geliyor: Bir pusu kurmak ve onlara en beklenmedik anda saldırmak için muhteşem bir yer."
